name: Chocolate Pudding Tarts
preparation: Preheat oven to 375° F. Place tart shells on Sheet Pan. Bake for 10–12 min or until golden.
Meanwhile, in a bowl, whisk pudding mix with milk until well blended, about 2 min. Cover and chill in fridge for 10 min.
Remove tarts from foil cups. Let cool, then spoon in pudding. Arrange on a platter and serve.
tips: Tarts taste best well-chilled. If time allows, refrigerate at least 10–15 min before serving. If making ahead, bake tart shells and prep filling overnight. Refrigerate until ready to use. Fill tarts up to 3 hours before serving.

products.name: Chocolate Instant Pudding Mix (Pack of 2)
summary: Spoon after delicious spoon, satisfy your sweet tooth with a low-calorie chocolate pudding that’s decadent and oh-so-good.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.
